Articles.Content: About to watch now. Thought I share. Can't be long now!

These lucky bastards uploaded simultaneously.

Scott, Danny, Pleb, Ryan....

I don't know what to watch first!

These lucky bastards uploaded simultaneously.

Scott, Danny, Pleb, Ryan....

I don't know what to watch first!

After Ryan, I'm going to watch Danny and Scott! Now I can't wait!

Though I do have to say, I think they overdid the Mun craters. Overall, the update looks good so far, though. Also, CREW MANAGEMENT IS CONFIRMED! WHOOP-WHOOP!

After Ryan, I'm going to watch Danny and Scott! Now I can't wait!

Though I do have to say, I think they overdid the Mun craters. Overall, the update looks good so far, though. Also, CREW MANAGEMENT IS CONFIRMED! WHOOP-WHOOP!

Yeah, some of the smaller moon craters feel a bit too densely packed, though having proper craters is still an improvement.
All these videos, all this waiting. It's killing me! I'm just so excited, I can't wait. I haven't played KSP in a week 'cause of the update. It's gonna be great.
Watched Scott's video just now, did anyone else notice that you can now plant flags on the roof of the VAB?

Not more vids! Please just release it! I want to see it myself!

....

I'm good now.

Not more vids! Please just release it! I want to see it myself!

....

I'm good now.

Shouldn't be long now! I would give my predictions, but the devs see all...

I just want someone to do a video showcasing all the new parts, so as to satisfy my lust...

I MUST FEED ON UPDATES BLARGHHHHHHHHHH

Yeah, some of the smaller moon craters feel a bit too densely packed, though having proper craters is still an improvement.

That's my feeling as well. I think it would look much better with a more varied terrain, some areas with a lot of craters and others with more smooth surfaces, like the maria on our own Moon. Would make it easier to find good landing spots, too. But at least Scott Manley said in his 0.21 preview video that they might be tweaking it further, so this might not be the final verison.
I can't wait for proper full crew management...I always like to have a little bit of RPGish stuff with my simulations so that the crew is not so static and bland

These lucky bastards uploaded simultaneously.

Scott, Danny, Pleb, Ryan....

I don't know what to watch first!

Could you provide Youtube or forum links to these? I can't seem to catch the KSPTV channel, and I've seen three of them (Scott Manley's, Solar Gamer's, and Pleb's) and can't find the fourth.

I missed that! Yes, it will be cool. I asked some time ago for a way to add notes about the use of a particular craft that might be a little finicky (e.g., "WARNING: Launch at or below 2/3rds throttle!") to aid in .craft file exchanges. If I understand you right, this sounds like it would fit the bill nicely!

The new launch dialog says you can add descriptionsÃ¯Â»Â¿ for your craft.

ERMAGHERD! It'll be so useful! Glad they finally got around to implementing them.
